headline.main: After $1 Billion Loss, Senior Citadel Manager Derek Kaufman Steps Down

snippet: Mr. Kaufman ran a portfolio for investors that placed bets on currencies, interest rates and sovereign bonds around the world.
abstract: Derek Kaufman resigns post as senior manager at hedge fund Citadel after losing $1 billion in investor funds in 2014.
